sen.j: 鬼室神社（きしつじんじゃ）とは、滋賀県蒲生郡日野町 (滋賀県)にある神社である。
sen.e: Kishitsu-jinja Shrine stands in Hino-cho, Gamo-gun, Shiga Prefecture.
Kishitsu-jinja Shrine is a Shinto shrine located in Hino-cho, Gamo-gun, Shiga Prefecture.
Kishitsu-jinja Shrine is a Shinto shrine located in Hino-cho, Gamo-gun, Shiga Prefecture.

sen.j: 7世紀の百済からの渡来人であった鬼室集斯の墓碑が本殿裏の石祠に祀られている。
sen.e: Enshrined has been the gravestone of Shushi Kishitsu who was a toraijin (people from overseas, especially from China and Korea, who settled in early Japan and introduced Continental culture to the Japanese) from Baekje in the seventh century.

The gravestone of Shushi Kishitsu who was a toraijin (people from overseas, especially from China and Korea, who settled in early Japan and introduced Continental culture to the Japanese) from Baekje in the seventh century is enshrined in the stone shrine behind the main sanctuary.
sen.cmt: 訳漏れを追記、時制を修正しました。
sen.e: The gravestone of Shushi Kishitsu who was a toraijin (people from overseas, especially from China and Korea, who settled in early Japan and introduced Continental culture to the Japanese) from Baekje in the seventh century is enshrined in the stone shrine behind the main sanctuary.

sen.j: 父の鬼室福信が韓国の扶余郡恩山面にある恩山別神堂に祀られていることから、日野町と恩山面との姉妹都市交流がさかんに行われている。
sen.e: From the fact that his father, Fukushin Kishitsu, has been enshrined in Unzanbesshin-do Hall, in Unzanmen, Fuyo District, South Korea, sister-city exchange is active between Hino-cho and Unzanmen.
sen.cmt: 一原文一訳文の例外対処
sen.e: Since his father, Fukushin Kishitsu, is enshrined in Unzanbesshin-do Hall, in Unzanmen, Fuyo District, South Korea, the sister-city exchanges are active between Hino-cho and Unzanmen.
sen.cmt: 時制を修正、定冠詞を追加しました。
sen.e: Since his father, Fukushin Kishitsu, is enshrined in Unzanbesshin-do Hall, in Unzanmen, Fuyo District, South Korea, the sister-city exchanges are active between Hino-cho and Unzanmen.

sen.j: そのため、案内板などは韓国語が併記されている。
sen.e: That is why information board and so forth are written in Japanese and Korean languages.
sen.cmt: 一原文一訳文の例外対処
sen.e: That is why information board and so on are written in Japanese and Korean languages.
sen.cmt: 用語統一リストに従い、修正しました。
sen.e: That is why information board and so on are written in Japanese and Korean languages.
